section:
Class List Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:ArgumentParser
Class ArgumentParser provides a convenient interface for parsing command line arguments using the getopt_long(3) function ConfigParser
Class ConfigParser provides a convenient interface for parsing a configuration file using std::regex Converter
Base class for audio converters Creater
Base class for factory method. Base class for all creater classes DistortionCreater
Class responsible for the creation of Distortion Converter DistortionOption
Class for applying distortion to an audio file MixCreater
Class responsible for the creation of Mix converters MixOption
Class for mixing two audio files MuteCreater
Class responsible for the creation of Mute Converter MuteOption
Class for muting a section of an audio file ReaderWAV
A class to read and handle WAV audio files RegistrarConvertors
This .h file implements a class for creating dynamic help about converters in the general code SoundProcessorWAVHeader
A structure representing the header of a WAV file WriterWAV
A class to write WAV audio files
